A world where the deceased can provide guidance and wisdom to the living, creating a society with more collective knowledge andizedized experience.
The resurrection of the dead would bring about a significant shift in the economy as families and communities would have to adjust to the new reality of having their loved ones back.
The return of the dead would have a profound impact on religious beliefs, as it would challenge the concept of death as the final destination and raise questions about the nature of existence.

The resurrection of the dead could lead to a significant increase in medical research and development, as scientists would be more motivated to find cures and treatments for diseases if they knew that their loved ones could return.

The return of the dead would also have a significant impact on the arts and literature, as writers and artists would be inspired by the experiences of the deceased and the possibilities of a world where the dead can return.
